sentences.sContent: Pour a little glue into some shallow containers, dip cotton balls in the glue and then stick onto the paper - you have a snow mural!
sentences.sContent_eng: Pour a little glue into some shallow containers, dip cotton balls in the glue and then stick onto the paper - you have a snow mural!
sentences.sCn: 在一个浅的容器里倒一点胶水，用棉球沾点胶水然后粘到纸上——你就有了幅雪景壁饰！

sentences.sContent: This work is clearly connected with The Last Supper: the Christ has the same ethereal and elusive quality as the faded figure at the centre of Leonardo's sublime mural.
sentences.sContent_eng: This work is clearly connected with The Last Supper: the Christ has the same ethereal and elusive quality as the faded figure at the centre of Leonardo's sublime mural.
sentences.sCn: 这幅画显然和《最后的晚餐》有某种关联：画中的基督，和达·芬奇最伟大的壁画中心那已褪色的基督形象一样，同样空灵缥缈。

trans.tranOther: a painting that is painted on a wall, either inside or outside a building
